mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community ( id, start_date, end_date, loc_category, notice, total, deadline ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{locCategory}, #{notice}, #{total}, #{deadline} );
mapper.select: SELECT content.id, title, deadline, view_point, total, status, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM owner WHERE content_id = content.id ) participants_count, ( SELECT login_id FROM member m, owner o WHERE m.id = o.member_id AND o.owm = 'writer' AND o.content_id = content.id ) writer FROM community, content WHERE community.id = content.id LIMIT 10;

SELECT content.id, title, deadline, view_point, total, status, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM owner WHERE content_id = content.id ) participants_count, ( SELECT login_id FROM member m, owner o WHERE m.id = o.member_id AND o.owm = 'writer' AND o.content_id = content.id ) writer FROM community, content WHERE community.id = content.id AND #{type} = #{keyword} LIMIT 10;
SELECT c1.*, c2.title, c2.created_at, c2.modified_at FROM community c1, content c2 WHERE c1.id = c2.id AND c1.id = #{id};
SELECT o.member_id, o.own, m.login_id, m.profile FROM member m, owner o WHERE m.id = o.member_id AND o.content_id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, loc_category = #{locCategory}, notice = #{notice}, total = #{total}, deadline = #{deadline} WHERE id = #{id}
